methods.text: Sets a value T as the task-local value for the future F.

methods.code: pub fn sync_scope<F, R>(&'static self, value: T, f: F) -> R where F: FnOnce() -> R,
methods.text: Sets a value T as the task-local value for the closure F.

methods.code: pub fn with<F, R>(&'static self, f: F) -> R where F: FnOnce(&T) -> R,
methods.text: Accesses the current task-local and runs the provided closure.

methods.code: pub fn try_with<F, R>(&'static self, f: F) -> Result<R, AccessError> where F: FnOnce(&T) -> R,
methods.text: Accesses the current task-local and runs the provided closure.
Returns a copy of the task-local value if the task-local value implements Copy.
